name: Stronger Together (Hawke Gaming)
description:
Stronger Together (very original title, I know) is a fun, silly game where the player must harness the power of friendship to cross impassible chasms. In other words, you make bridges out of smiling beams of wood. 

All the sound effects were made by hand (or by mouth/pencil if you want to get literal), and the music, art, and code was also made by myself (which is why it's so terrible :p).

I hope you enjoy the game, and please don't forget to give it a rating! :D

(Feedback is also very appreciated)
